/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of colors that add vibrancy to the scene. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. In the distance, mountains rise against the horizon, adding a touch of nature's grandeur to the cityscape.
